title: Google preps Android Desktop images for developers ahead of Google Play Games on Windows
content:
Back in December, Google confirmed that it was working on an official way to play Android games on Windows PCs. We saw a limited beta testing program for the new Google Play Games desktop application drop in January, and a more public PC beta began to roll out in Taiwan, South Korea, and Hong Kong

The post Google preps Android Desktop images for developers ahead of Google Play Games on Windows appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is preparing "Android Desktop" images for developers, ahead of the Google Play Games on Windows wider launch. Check it out here.
